ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD braves NBC's Heroes, and finds out which celebrities are getting all hot and bothered by global warming! MAD also spoofs The Biggest Loser and My Super Sweet 16. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Monroe, the Strip Club, the Fold-In and much more!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:09:10. [Issue ID 129318]
